message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I think you'll find this price very fair.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? It's a fantastic deal for a product you'll truly value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can we discuss further?
